creator: vladimir@bossicard.com
text:
It would be nice if the <java> task could have a debug mode and output (e.g.)
the classpath it's using (and other valuable infos).  It would really help when
having problems with the classpath.

Try using the -debug flag and if you wish to focus in on the <java> task, use a 
<record> task around it.
creator: conor@apache.org
